alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Dickson; Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:25PM CDT until July 01 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... Western Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Clarksville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Coopertown, Pleasant View, Adams, Slayden, Cheatham Dam, Palmyra, Cunningham and Woodlawn. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 1 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
